node.html:
• Developed and maintained Malika Dashboard using Metabase for interactive data visualization and improved public data services.
  • Currently building an AI-powered chatbot to streamline statistical data access and enhance user experience.
  • Managed dissemination activities, handled public data requests, and ensured timely delivery of accurate statistical information.
  • Maintained network infrastructure, and actively developed web and Android applications supporting data collection and dissemination.
  • Performed data engineering tasks, analyzing complex datasets to generate actionable insights for data-driven decision-making.

• Collected, processed, and analyzed statistical data through surveys and censuses to produce accurate and timely reports for decision-making purposes.
  • Developed and maintained the SIPADU 8203 Android application using Flutter, focusing on responsive UI design, real-time data integration, and comprehensive user authentication.
  • Managed integrated statistical systems (IPDS), including data dissemination, IT infrastructure maintenance, and Geographic Information Systems (GIS).
  • Collaborated with government agencies and stakeholders to ensure data integrity, accuracy, and consistency across regional and national statistical publications.
  • Prepared annual activity plans and performance evaluations for statistical data processing and dissemination activities within the district.
